parameters.name: Algorithm
parameters.description: The algorithm. Valid values: RSA, SM2, and ECC. For more information about algorithms, see [Select an SSL certificate](~~197871~~).

parameters.name: CommonName
parameters.description: The primary domain name, which is a common name.

parameters.name: CountryCode
parameters.description: The code of the country or region in which the organization is located. For example, you can use CN to indicate China and use US to indicate the United States.

parameters.name: Department
parameters.description: The department that uses the certificate.

parameters.name: KeySize
parameters.description:
The key length that is used by the algorithm.

*   The key length for RSA algorithms can be 2,048, 3,072, and 4,096 bits.
*   The key length for ECC and SM2 algorithms can be 256 bits.

parameters.name: Locality
parameters.description: The city where the company is located.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the CSR. The name can be up to 50 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), hyphens (-), and periods (.).

parameters.name: Province
parameters.description: The province or location where the company is located.

parameters.name: Sans
parameters.description: The secondary domain names. Separate multiple domain names with commas (,). You can use the CSR to apply for a certificate for both the primary and secondary domain names.
